hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT paroleBoardItinerary FROM omis.paroleboarditinerary.domain.ParoleBoardItinerary as paroleBoardItinerary WHERE ((paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate is null or paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate <= :effectiveDate) AND (paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate is null or paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate >= :effectiveDate)) OR :effectiveDate is null ORDER BY paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate, paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate desc

SELECT paroleBoardItinerary FROM omis.paroleboarditinerary.domain.ParoleBoardItinerary as paroleBoardItinerary WHERE (:startDate is null and :endDate is null) OR (paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate is null and paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate is null) OR ((paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate is null or paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate <= :endDate or :endDate is null) and (paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate is null or paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate >= :startDate or :startDate is null)) ORDER BY paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate, paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate desc

SELECT new omis.paroleboarditinerary.report.ParoleBoardItinerarySummary( paroleBoardItinerary.id, paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.startDate, paroleBoardItinerary.dateRange.endDate, organization.name) FROM omis.paroleboarditinerary.domain.ParoleBoardItinerary as paroleBoardItinerary INNER JOIN paroleBoardItinerary.location location INNER JOIN location.organization organization WHERE paroleBoardItinerary = :boardItinerary

SELECT new omis.paroleboarditinerary.report.BoardAttendeeSummary( boardAttendee.id, name.lastName, name.firstName, name.middleName, boardAttendee.role) FROM omis.paroleboarditinerary.domain.BoardAttendee boardAttendee INNER JOIN boardAttendee.boardMember boardMember INNER JOIN boardMember.staffAssignment staffAssignment INNER JOIN staffAssignment.staffMember staffMember INNER JOIN staffMember.name name where boardAttendee.boardItinerary = :boardItinerary
